data.eml:eml: Paracamisia osornensis gen. n., sp. n. (Acari: Oribatida) from Valdivian forest soil in Chile

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Olszanowski, Ziemowit, Norton, Roy A. (2002): Paracamisia osornensis gen. n., sp. n. (Acari: Oribatida) from Valdivian forest soil in Chile. Zootaxa 25: 1-15, DOI: 10.5072/zenodo.155548
